General.Name: Wihlborgs Fastigheter AB (publ)
General.Description: Wihlborgs Fastigheter AB (publ), a property company, owns, develops, rents, and manages commercial properties in the Öresund region, Sweden. The company's property portfolio includes office/retail, logistics/production, and projects and land in Malmö, Helsingborg, Lund, and Copenhagen. Wihlborgs Fastigheter AB (publ) was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Malmö, Sweden.

4.Title: Chief Information Officer for IT & Digital Bus. Devel.
